c1.name: Crimson Bouquet
c1.descriptionraw: While in a <color=#FFD780FF>Paramita Papilio</color> state activated by <color=#FFD780FF>Guide to Afterlife</color>, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.
c1.description: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

c2.name: Ominous Rainfall
c2.descriptionraw:
Increases the <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Soother</color> will also apply the <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> effect.
c2.description:
Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

c3.name: Lingering Carmine
c3.descriptionraw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guide to Afterlife</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Garden of Eternal Rest
c4.descriptionraw: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a <color=#FFD780FF>Blood Blossom</color> that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.
c4.description: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

c5.name: Floral Incense
c5.descriptionraw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Soother</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Butterfly's Embrace
c6.descriptionraw:
Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, her All Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.
